about_the_game:
Apple Hero is a puzzle game where you need to figure out, how to make the Hero reach his goal.

Your goal in this game is to create a path of apples for the hero and bring him to the flag. But remember that the hero always moves only to the nearest apple. After eating it, the hero moves on to the next one. Along the way, the hero must collect all the coins and avoid danger. In general, the mechanics are clear, and the level design will definitely make you think!

Each level in the game was created manually and has its own idea, so you will have to think about solving each puzzle.
As you progress through the game, new mechanics will appear, revealing the game from a new side. For example, rabbits, who, like our hero, love apples, but who do not need to be brought to the goal. Or portals that become helpers in some situations and an obstacle in others, and much more. Or, for example, what will happen if there are two heroes?

So, explore all the puzzles and find your solution for each one!
